lyrics:
46 contributorsdream lyricsverse 1
in the dark and im right on the middle mark
im just in the tier of everything that rides below the surface
and i watch from a distance seventeen
and im short of the others dreams of being golden and on top
its not what you painted in my head

but life aint what it seems

they lead me to believe
that everythings a mess

i wanna dream
leave me to dream

we have the curtains drawn and closed
